definitions.definition: Of or relating to the Bible .
examples: Tithing is both a quranic and biblical virtue.

definitions.definition: In accordance with the teachings of the Bible (according to some interpretation of it).
Very great ; especially, exceeding previous records in scale .

main_definition: Of or relating to the Bible .
secondary_definitions: In accordance with the teachings of the Bible (according to some interpretation of it).
( figurative ) Very great ; especially, exceeding previous records in scale .
